roleset.name: Stop firing
roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in nouns-00060. No relevant VN entry. Framed by Claire.

example.name: Arg1 and Modifiers
example.text: It is vital to maintain formal diplomatic relations with as many countries as possible until such time as there is a tacit diplomatic cease - fire with Communist China.

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat has called for Palestinian militant groups to renew their cease-fire with Israel.
